mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ca_event ( CA_EVENT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, CA_TYPE, ANNOUNCE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, PARAM1, PARAM2, PARAM3, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{caEventId}, #{instrumentId}, #{caType}, #{announceDate}, #{effectiveDate}, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{status}, #{sourceSystem}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT CA_EVENT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, CA_TYPE, ANNOUNCE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, PARAM1, PARAM2, PARAM3, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM ca_event WHERE CA_EVENT_ID = #{id}
SELECT CA_EVENT_ID, INSTRUMENT_ID, CA_TYPE, ANNOUNCE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, PARAM1, PARAM2, PARAM3, STATUS, SOURCE_SYSTEM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM ca_event WHERE Instrument_ID = #{instrumentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ca_event SET status = #{status}, version = version + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE ca_event_id = #{caEventId} AND version = #{version}
